column1: Table 7-16:  U.S. Population (Millions), Population Served by Biological Denitrification (Millions), Fraction of Population Served by Wastewater Treatment (percent), Available Protein (kg/person-year), Protein Consumed (kg/person-year), and Nitrogen Removed with Sludge (kt-N/year)

Sources: Population: U.S. Census Bureau (2018); PopulationND: EPA (1992), EPA (1996), EPA (2000), EPA (2004), EPA (2008b), EPA (2012); WWTP Population: U.S. Census Bureau (2015); Available Protein: USDA (2018b); N Removed with sludge: Beecher et al. (2007), McFarland (2001), EPA (1999), EPA (1993c).
